tool_description: Financial data for over 75,000 stocks on over 75 exchanges. Download conveniently formatted financial statements, dividends, end of day prices and more. Need higher usage, custom integration or additional features? Contact us for custom pricing.
name: Freedom Finance
title: Freedom Finance

api_list.name: Live Stock Statistics
api_list.description: Get all the real time statistics about the stock (market cap, etc)

api_list.name: Live Stock Metadata
api_list.description: Get all the real time metadata about the stock  (currency, trend averages etc)

api_list.name: Historic Stock Prices
api_list.description: List all end of day quotes (open, close, high, low, volume etc) for given stock symbol

api_list.name: Quarterly Cashflow Statements
Quarterly Balance Sheets
Quarterly Income Statements
Yearly Balance Sheets
Yearly Income Statements
Yearly Cashflow Statements
Stock Splits
api_list.description: List all stock splits for given stock symbol

api_list.name: Dividends
api_list.description: Download dividend history by specific stock symbol

api_list.name: Companies By Exchange
api_list.description: Convenient User-Friendly Manually Populated List Of Common Stocks Per Exchange Code. Not Guaranteed To Be Up To Date.

api_list.name: List exchanges
api_list.description: List all exchanges known to have stocks associated with them
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://freedom-finance.p.rapidapi.com/exchanges"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "freedom-finance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://freedom-finance.p.rapidapi.com/exchanges"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "freedom-finance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
